Rob Mitchum

I'm a science and music writer in Oak Park, Illinois. My work has appeared in the Chicago Tribune, Pitchfork, SEED magazine, and The Classical. I'm currently communications manager for the Computation Institute at the University of Chicago and Argonne National Laboratory.
